get.summary: Retrieve a list of appeals or search appeals

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of result dataset records. offset = (page*size)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size count of records on result page. limit = (size++)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to be retrieved as a result.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the result according to fields.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter by unique IDs.

parameters.name: q
name
parameters.description: Filter by appeal name.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Filter by appeal type.

 - TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value
 - CALL: Call
 - CHAT: Chat
 - SOCIAL_MEDIA: Social Media
 - EMAIL: Email
 - API: API
 - MANUAL: Manual

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request message for creating a new appeal.

get.summary: Locate an appeal by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the appeal to locate.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to be retrieved into result.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the appeal to delete.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of catalogs or search catalogs

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Fields to be retrieved as a result.
If the user passes "-" as the value for fields,
it will retrieve all available fields for each catalog.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting options by fields

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: List of IDs to filter the catalogs

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string for filtering by name

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter by state (true for active, false for inactive)

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
Filter by the depth of the hierarchy to retrieve services.
The depth indicates how many ancestor levels of services
will be included for each catalog.
- A depth of 0 includes only the direct catalog.
- A depth of 1 includes the catalog and its immediate services.
- By default the depth is unlimited,
  meaning all nested services and sub-services will be included.

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to be deleted

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to be updated

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Input data for updating the catalog

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the catalog to be updated

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Input data for updating the catalog

webitel.cases.Type.description:
Represents a source type for the appeal.

 - TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value
 - CALL: Call
 - CHAT: Chat
 - SOCIAL_MEDIA: Social Media
 - EMAIL: Email
 - API: API
 - MANUAL: Manual
